name: Synthesize ChatGPT
author: Hadesker.Net
description: The Synthesize ChatGPT is a powerful extension that enables you to effortlessly download audio files generated by ChatGPT directly to your computer. With a simple and intuitive interface, you can save your favorite conversations in audio format for easy offline access. Whether for study, entertainment, or reference, this extension provides a seamless way to keep ChatGPT audio files at your fingertips. Dev by hadesker.net
